name: adventures in turquoise
description:
little game  where you're a cube and you gotta get to the turquoise.  10 levels of  obstacle avoidance with a ton of new blocks, mechanics and challenges . took a few weeks to create in unity with help from brackeys. my first full game and I'm very proud.   have fun. 

pick it up for free ( or donate ) and see if you can complete the 10 levels
